about_the_game:
Now that Lil' Dude has turned 30, he's decided to become a wizard and summon a succubus to take his virginity!

Use alchemy to brew the potions and ingredients needed to summon and seduce each succubus. Can you help Lil' Dude get laid?

The free demo contains 1 succubus to get you started. There are more succubi and ingredients in the full version (save data should transfer).
